title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Nov 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Nov 29 2021
description:
Left-wing political prop, Fauci, in a non sequitur, calls for Ted Cruz to be investigated for Jan 6, in order to ward off legitimate criticisms of himself. The left always talks about the consequences of "misinformation." What about the consequences of wrong information? Change up in twitter: Jack Dorsey resigns as CEO, woke activist takes control. Will this bring about more conservative censorship? C&B declare they will probably be banned from twitter. We're failing to make basic risk assessments for kids. Arizona State students seek Kyle Rittenhouse removal from online classes.

Reply

Reply all
